sentences.en: Images are projected onto the retina of the eye.
sentences.cn: 影像被投射到眼睛的视网膜上。

sentences.en: Bruno had to have eye surgery on a torn retina two years ago.
sentences.cn: 布鲁诺两年前因为视网膜破裂不得不进行了一次眼部手术。

sentences.en: Each cluster includes a pair of eyes with a sophisticated lens, retina, iris and cornea. Scientists aren't sure how they process what they see.
sentences.cn: 每组包括一对拥有复杂晶状体、视网膜、虹膜和角膜的眼睛。科学家们还不确定它们如何处理它们看到的东西。
